Package com.game.myGame

Class Santa

java.lang.Object
com.game.myGame.Sprite
com.game.myGame.Santa
public class Santa
extends Sprite
This class is build to represent the main character of the game: Santa Claus He has some special actions more than a normal sprite, so he has his own class
Author:
MatteoValerio

  • Constructor Details

    • Santa

      public Santa​(int posX, int posY, java.lang.String name, ImageLoader imgL, int xMax, java.lang.String levelName)
      public constructor. It takes the starting position x and y, the name, and imageLoader and the max x position of the screen
      Parameters:
      posX - Starting x
      posY - Starting y
      name - Name of the sprite
      imgL - Image loader for animation
      xMax - Maximum x of the screen

      private void updateFalling()
      Updates the falling part of the jump

    • getHit

      public int getHit​(int damage)
      Santa gets hit
      Parameters:
      damage - . In a scale between 1 to 100.
      Returns:
      The life of Santa after being hit

    • fire

      public void fire()
      It shoots a present. A new object Present is added to the list of the presents shot by Santa He can shoot only if he didn't already shoot 10 presents

    • missiles

      public void missiles()
      It shoots a present. A new object Present is added to the list of the presents shot by Santa He can shoot only if he didn't already shoot 10 presents

    • specialMissile

      public void specialMissile()
      Special attack by santa. It can happen only when he has hit at least 10 times the enemy.

    • specialMissileAvailable

      public boolean specialMissileAvailable()
      Returns:
      True if there is a special missile available. Only level2.

    • specialFire

      public void specialFire()
      Special attack by santa. It can happen only when he has hit at least 10 times the enemy.

    • incrementHitCounter

      public void incrementHitCounter()
      It increments the hit point of santa

    • specialShootAvailable

      public boolean specialShootAvailable()
      It returns if the special shoot is available
      Returns:
      True if available

    • getPresents

      public java.util.ArrayList<Present> getPresents()
      returns the list of all the presents Santa has shot
      Returns:
      An ArrayList of all the presents shot

    • getLife

      public int getLife()
      It gives the remaining life of Santa
      Returns:
      int representing the percentage of life remained

    • getLifePercent

      public int getLifePercent()
      Returns:
      The percentage of the remaining life of santa
